briefTitle: A Safety and Efficacy Study of BCD-021 With Paclitaxel and Carboplatin Compared to Avastin With Paclitaxel and Carboplatin in Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer

outcomeMeasures.title: Overall Response Rate
outcomeMeasures.description: Per Response Evaluation Criteria In Solid Tumors Criteria (RECIST v1.0) for target lesions and assessed by MRI: Complete Response (CR), Disappearance of all target lesions; Partial Response (PR), \>=30% decrease in the sum of the longest diameter of target lesions; Overall Response (OR) = CR + PR.

outcomeMeasures.title: Area Under the Curve After the First Test Drug Administration
outcomeMeasures.description: primary outcome measure for pharmacokinetics (PK) substudy

outcomeMeasures.title: Complete Response Rate
outcomeMeasures.description: secondary outcome measure for efficacy evaluation

outcomeMeasures.title: Partial Response Rate
outcomeMeasures.description: secondary outcome measure for efficacy evaluation

outcomeMeasures.title: Stabilization Rate
outcomeMeasures.description: secondary outcome measure for efficacy evaluation

outcomeMeasures.title: Progression Rate
outcomeMeasures.description: secondary outcome measure for efficacy evaluation

outcomeMeasures.title: Occurrence of Anti-bevacizumab Antibodies
outcomeMeasures.description: Secondary outcome measure for immunogenicity assessment
